title: transferred by paragraph (1) of this Article shall, on and after the commencement
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Science Foundation Ireland (Members
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Science Foundation Ireland (Members 

of Board) (Transfer of Ministerial Functions) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited science foundation ireland (members board) (transfer ministerial functions) order 2020 (2) order come operation 1 january 2021

title: transferred by paragraph (1) of this Article shall, on and after the commencement
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

(2) References to the Department of Education contained in any Act or any 
instrument made under such Act and relating to any administration and business 
transferred by paragraph (1) of this Article shall, on and after the commencement 
of this Order, be construed as references to the Department of Enterprise, Trade 
and Employment.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department enterprise trade employment (2) reference department education contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) article shall commencement order construed reference department enterprise trade employment

title: transferred by paragraph (1) of this Article shall, on and after the commencement
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Education by section 8 of the
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Education by section 8 of the 
Industrial Development (Science Foundation Ireland) Act 2003 (No. 30 of 2003) 
are transferred to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

(2) References to the Minister for Education contained in any Act or 
instrument made under such Act and relating to any functions transferred by 
paragraph (1) shall, on and after the commencement of this Order, be construed 
as references to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister education section 8 industrial development (science foundation ireland) act 2003 (no 30 2003) transferred minister enterprise trade employment (2) reference minister education contained act instrument made act relating function transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference minister enterprise trade employment

title: transferred by paragraph (1) of this Article shall, on and after the commencement
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Education is a party and the 
proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister 
for Enterprise, Trade and Employment, the name of the Minister for Enterprise, 
Trade and Employment shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any functions 
transferred by this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of the 
Minister for Education or added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and 
the proceedings shall not abate by reason of such substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister education party proceeding reference function transferred order minister enterprise trade employment name minister enterprise trade employment shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister education added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: transferred by paragraph (1) of this Article shall, on and after the commencement
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Education, may in so far as it relates to 
functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment, be carried on or completed on or after such commencement by the 
Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th December, 2020.

title: transferred by paragraph (1) of this Article shall, on and after the commencement
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the exercise of a function transferred by this Order, if and insofar as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, has effect on and 
after such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for 
Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order insofar operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister enterprise trade employment

title: transferred by paragraph (1) of this Article shall, on and after the commencement
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Education contained in the memorandum
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Education contained in the memorandum 
and articles of association of any company and relating to any function 
transferred by this Order shall, on and after the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
text_norm: 7 reference minister education contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister enterprise trade employment

title: transferred by paragraph (1) of this Article shall, on and after the commencement
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Education in connection with 
the functions transferred by this Order are transferred on the commencement to 
the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment and, accordingly, without 
any further conveyance, transfer or assignment - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Enterprise, Trade and Employment, 

those rights are rights of the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment, 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Enterprise, Trade 
and Employment. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Enterprise, Trade and Employment by this Article which, on the commencement 
of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for Education shall on the 
request of the Minister for Education be transferred into the name of the Minister 
for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

1 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
